availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Reuben Hall White (Caldwell County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Robertson County, Tennessee, native. Son of Reuben H. White and Hannah B. Morse White. Apprentice in Robertson County in 1850. Blacksmith in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Robertson County, District 11, p. 92B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 112.
Find A Grave, "Reuben Hall White (1831-1915)," Memorial #77225259 http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/77225259 (accessed March 1, 2021).
